description: Not able to go past collection of server IP, username and password. Seems to be just this dialog collect your sensitive information. App does not seem trustworthy.
summary: Fake app – only collects your server IP, username and password

description: Would be great if it integrated with the local file system as a folder. It is not a fake app collecting sensitive info, the credential dialog does not have great feed back when you enter incorrect information.
Have to agree with other reviewer. I fear it just collects login and password...
this ain't app actually , I dont't have the feeling that you were serious when you made it

I had to add 443 inside my normal address. ......cnow.at:443/remote......
I saw it in my Ghostcloud app on my Ubuntu Touch phone, and I did not add 443 in there myself. 
So at least now it works. but like jjamie said there is no feed back when you add "wrong" information, basically nothing happens.
Habe schon lange nach eine Webdav Anwendung gesucht ;)
Objetivo: Poder usar mi cuenta nextcloud/owncloud SIN tener que sincronizar/descargar todos los archivos que se encuentran en el servidor y asi poder trabajar desde diferentes terminales

Très sympa, une fenêtre sur notre cloud (pas une synchro donc) avec possibilité de téléchargement, d'upload, etc. Pas de glisser déplacer, et pas de demande de remplacement en cas de conflit cependant.
